Name: EDOM
Message: Math arg out of domain of func

Name: ELIBACC
Message: Can't access a needed shared lib.

Name: ELIBEXEC
Message: Attempting to exec a shared library.

Name: ELIBMAX
Message: Attempting to link in too many libs.

Name: ENONET
Message: Machine is not on the network

Name: ENOTNAM
Message: Not a XENIX named type file

Name: EOVERFLOW
Message: value too large to be stored in data type

Name: ERFKILL
Message: Operation not possible due to RF-kill

Name: ESTRPIPE
Message: if pipe/FIFO, don't sleep in stream head
